title: Autodesk Desktop App Link Following Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Autodesk Desktop App. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the handling of updates. By creating a symbolic link, an attacker can abuse the application to delete a file. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Autodesk has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.autodesk.com/trust/security-advisories/adsk-sa-2022-0015
timeline:
2022-03-16 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2022-07-29 - Coordinated public release of advisory
credit: Michael DePlante (@izobashi) of Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative
